titles.title: Expressing the profound sorrow of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Walter B. Jones.
Expressing the profound sorrow of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Walter B. Jones.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution declares that (1) the House of Representatives has heard with profound sorrow of the death of the Honorable Walter B. Jones, a Representative from North Carolina; and (2) when the House adjourns on February 11, 2019, it adjourn as a further mark of respect to the memory of the deceased.
